backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining Child, Letter, and Photo records with add/get functions and in‑memory maps plus sorted photo queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON-style listing summarizing each frontend file’s purpose within the Valentine-themed app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color tokens and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component orchestrating sections, theme behavior, persisted state usage, and lightbox rendering.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Animat: Component that progressively reveals letter text unless reduced‑motion is enabled.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Custom: Panel for editing personalization fields, generating share links, and resetting local browser‑stored data.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Detail: Shows date, place, and note details if provided; otherwise displays a prompt to add them.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Floati: Renders floating decorative icons unless reduced-motion mode is enabled.
frontend/src/components/valentine/FlowNa: Provides a bottom navigation bar to switch between main love-letter sections.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Galler: Displays uploaded photos with captions and deletion controls, plus an uploader and info alert.
frontend/src/components/valentine/IntroS: Shows intro names with heart icon and buttons to reveal or customize the page.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Letter: Allows previewing and editing of the love letter, including template selection and animated reveal.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Lightb: Full-screen photo viewer with navigation, close controls, captions, and index display.
frontend/src/components/valentine/PhotoU: Handles image uploads with validation and adds them to the photo gallery.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Reduce: Toggle switch to enable or disable reduced-motion mode.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Reveal: Animated reveal of the headline with buttons to access the letter or gallery.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Sectio: Simple wrapper adding transition styling around section content.
frontend/src/components/valentine/ThemeO: Applies background patterns and ornamental frames as decorative visuals.
frontend/src/content/islamicLetterTempla: Exports an array of Islamic-themed romantic letter templates with titles and content strings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, updating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identities, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides example React Query hooks using the backend actor, including a photo-fetching query.
frontend/src/hooks/useReducedMotion.ts: Zustand store and hook detecting system reduced‑motion preference and updating state accordingly.
frontend/src/hooks/useShareLink.ts: Generates and copies shareable URLs based on user config, with copy status and toast feedback.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom color variables, animations, and font imports for the UI theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/state/useLoveLetterConfig.t: Zustand store with persistence for managing love letter fields, templates, and UI section state.
frontend/src/state/usePhotoGallery.ts: Zustand store for managing photo gallery items, captions, and the active photo with persistence.
frontend/src/utils/shareQueryParams.ts: Parses share-related query params and generates clean share URLs with from/to values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration customizing colors, fonts, containers, animations, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, feature list, issues, and architectural notes for building a customizable Valentine-style webpage. It outlines current capabilities, known problems, and design requirements for further development.
